alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued August 18 at 6:23PM MST until August 18 at 7:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 730 PM MST. * At 622 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near Florence Junction to near Magma to near Florence, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 164 and 193. US Highway 60 between mile markers 211 and 211. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 163. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Gilbert, Casa Grande, Florence, Coolidge, Sun Lakes, Queen Creek, La Palma, Blackwater, Chandler Heights, Magma, San Tan Valley, Seville, Coolidge Airport and Bapchule. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
